params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.corrected
params.description: Indicates if the query was corrected by the spell checker.

params.name: data.corrected_text
params.description: Correction output consisting of the corrected keyword string.

params.name: data.corrected_html
params.description: Corrected output with html tags to highlight the corrected words. Corrected words are called out with the "..." html tags. For example, the user input query is "software enginear", where the second word, "enginear," is incorrect. It should be "engineer". When spelling correction is enabled, this value is "software engineer".
